name: Burr's Low Rez Quest
description:
Play as Burr in his mini quest against the bad ones. Tackle your opponents with zapping strength and slay the big one's every level! You are sure to have fun on this fast pace action game at the low resolution of 64x64(or less!)!

Engine- http://www.byond.com/
Text- https://lqdev.itch.io/geompixel

Credits-

Programming and Art-
Raffile (I am not much of an artist but, man... I did everything in the game ha. I am pretty happy with how it looks!)
